/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly red brick, punctuated by large windows that reflect the clear blue sky. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On the sidewalks, pedestrians can be seen going about their day, contributing to the lively atmosphere. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting a warm glow on the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
